LocaSwap is a single-page Android app developed by Ali Tagipour.

This project provides a simple, secure tool for location tracking, map display, and process control.

• Developer: Ali Tagipour
• Website: alitagipour.ir
• Language: Java
• IDE: Android Studio
• Open Source: Fully public / open-source. Anyone can use, review, or contribute.

Note: This is an educational demo. No liability for misuse or data issues.

2. No Liability:
Developer is not responsible for misuse, bugs, or data loss. For educational use only.

3. Legal Use:
Must comply with Iranian & international laws. Misuse is prohibited.

4. Privacy:
No sensitive data stored. Location used only for display. No background server calls.

To test fake location in Developer Options:

1. Go to Settings → About Phone → Build Number and tap 7 times.
2. Open Settings → Developer Options.
3. Enable Allow Mock Locations.
4. Select LocaSwap as the Mock Location App.
5. Now test fake locations in the app.

Warning: For development & testing only. Do not use in production.
